title: SigScale CGF: Records on the Bx interface for packet switched (PS) domain

SGSNPDPRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) serving GPRS support node (SGSN) packet data protocol (PDP) charging data record (CDR).

SGSNMMRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) serving GPRS support node (SGSN) mobility management (MM) charging data record (CDR).

SGSNSMORecord.description: Packet switched (PS) serving GPRS support node (SGSN) short message origination (SMO) charging data record (CDR).

SGSNSMTRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) serving GPRS support node (SGSN) short message termination (SMT) charging data record (CDR).

SGSNMTLCSRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) serving GPRS support node (SGSN) mobile terminated (MT) location request (LCS) charging data record (CDR).

SGSNMOLCSRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) serving GPRS support node (SGSN) mobile originated (MO) location request (LCS) charging data record (CDR).

SGSNNILCSRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) serving GPRS support node (SGSN) network induced (NI) location request (LCS) charging data record (CDR).

SGSNMBMSRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) serving GPRS support node (SGSN) multimedia broadcast and multicast service (MBMS) bearer context charging data record (CDR).

GGSNMBMSRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) gateway GPRS support node (SGSN) multimedia broadcast and multicast service (MBMS) bearer context charging data record (CDR).

SGWRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) evolved packet core (EPC) serving gateway (SGW) charging data record (CDR).

PGWRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) evolved packet core (EPC) packet data network gateway (SGW) charging data record (CDR).

GWMBMSRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) evolved packet core (EPC) multimedia broadcast and multicast service (MBMS) bearer context charging data record (CDR).

TDFRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) evolved packet core (EPC) application based charging (ABC) data in traffic detection function (TDF) charging data record (CDR).

IPERecord.description: Packet switched (PS) evolved packet core (EPC) IP-Edge (IPE) IP connectivity access network (IP-CAN) session charging data record (CDR).

EPDGRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) evolved packet core (EPC) evolved packet data gateway (ePDG) IP connectivity access network (IP-CAN) bearer charging data record (CDR).

TWAGRecord.description: Packet switched (PS) evolved packet core (EPC) trusted WLAN access gateway (TWAG) IP connectivity access network (IP-CAN) bearer charging data record (CDR).
